metadata.description: Official Red Hat Demo Platform (RHDP) skills marketplace for creating workshops, demos, and infrastructure automation

plugins.name: agnosticv-catalog-builder
plugins.description: Create or update AgnosticV catalog files (common.yaml, dev.yaml, description.adoc, info-message-template.adoc)

plugins.name: agnosticv-validator
plugins.description: Validate AgnosticV catalog configurations against best practices and deployment requirements

plugins.name: showroom-create-lab
plugins.description: Guide you through creating a single Red Hat Showroom workshop module from reference materials with business storytelling and proper AsciiDoc formatting

plugins.name: showroom-create-demo
plugins.description: Guide you through creating a Red Hat Showroom demo module using the Know/Show structure for presenter-led demonstrations

plugins.name: showroom-blog-generate
plugins.description: Transform completed Red Hat Showroom lab modules or demo content into blog posts for Red Hat Developer, internal blogs, or marketing platforms

plugins.name: showroom-verify-content
plugins.description: Run comprehensive quality verification on workshop or demo content using Red Hat standards and validation agents

plugins.name: health-deployment-validator
plugins.description: Create validation roles for RHDP deployment health checks and post-deployment validation
